Description.Text: Other amenities/services: All rooms with balcony or terrace, Plasma TV, Refrigerator, Safe, Phone, Bathrobes and slippers. Opened 1997
Important place or monument close to the hotel: Situated 50m from beach, 1,8km from Pythagorion. Nearest station/metro: Bus stop - 500m. Nearest Airport: Samos Airport - 4 km.
